message.name: InvalidEvent
message.desc: An Invalid Event. Fired in case of an error in the message passing system.

message.name: EntityCreateEvent
message.desc: Fired when an Entity is added to the EntitySystem.

message.name: EntityDestroyEvent
message.desc: Fired when an Entity is removed from the EntitySystem.

message.name: KeyPressedEvent
message.desc: Fired when a key is pressed.

message.name: KeyReleasedEvent
message.desc: Fired when a key is released.

message.name: KeyRepeatEvent
message.desc: Fired when a key repeats due to being pressed down for longer.

message.name: WindowResizeEvent
message.desc: Fired by the rendering system when the window is resized.
